logger.doc:name: Request SFDC Logger
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json indent = false --- { TimeStamp: (now() >> "UTC")[0 to 18], transactionId: vars.requestData.headers.'x-vio-transactionid', AppName: app.name, FlowName: flow.name, BusinessProcessName: "Customer Registration", Category: "Customer", OriginatingApplication: "Process API", DesinationApplication: "Salesforce", CustomerId: "NA", txnState: "SFDC Request" }]

salesforce:create.salesforce:records: #[[{ Name: vars.requestData.payload.contact.firstName, acceptDataPolicy__c: vars.requestData.payload.contact.acceptDataPolicy, acceptPIC__c: vars.requestData.payload.contact.acceptPIC, captchatoken__c: vars.requestData.payload.contact.captchatoken, confirmPassword__c: vars.requestData.payload.contact.confirmPassword, countryCode__c: vars.requestData.payload.contact.countryCode, email__c: vars.requestData.payload.contact.email, firstName__c: vars.requestData.payload.contact.firstName, lastName__c: vars.requestData.payload.contact.lastName, locale__c: vars.requestData.payload.contact.locale, mobile__c: vars.requestData.payload.contact.mobile, password__c: vars.requestData.payload.contact.password, recieveClaimsettle__c: vars.requestData.payload.contact.recieveClaimsettle, recieveNews__c: vars.requestData.payload.contact.recieveNews }]]

logger.doc:name: Response SFDC Logger
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json indent = false --- { TimeStamp: (now() >> "UTC")[0 to 18], transactionId: vars.requestData.headers.'x-vio-transactionid', AppName: app.name, FlowName: flow.name, BusinessProcessName: "Customer Registration", Category: "Customer", OriginatingApplication: "Process API", DesinationApplication: "Salesforce", CustomerId: "NA", txnState: "SFDC Response" }]
